fieldUpdates.formula: Survey_Manager__r.CS_Survey_Manager_Key__c & '_' & TEXT(version__c) & '_' & TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( HOUR( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MINUTE( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( SECOND( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Survey Version Auto Key

rules.fullName: CS Survey Version Auto Stamp key
